description: A vulnerability was found in liujianview gymxmjpa 1.0 and classified as critical. This issue affects the function GoodsDaoImpl of the file src/main/java/com/liujian/gymxmjpa/controller/GoodsController.java. The manipulation of the argument goodsName leads to sql injection. The attack may be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.
